components.html:
This is the most awesomely user-centred form ever. It surpasses the need for:

- discovering stuff
- planning of any kind
- testing with users - yawn right?
- internal review beyond that of its creator
- any lateral thought whatsoever - say what?

heading: Request permission to moonwalk to your next role
lede: Only use this form if you reckon you can leave team MOJO in style, like on roller skates.
